metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31122 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description:
Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability in mod_macro of Apache HTTP Server.Thisissue affects Apache HTTP Server: through 2.4.57.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apache2 - 2.4.55-1ubuntu2.1
apache2-bin - 2.4.55-1ubuntu2.1
apache2-data - 2.4.55-1ubuntu2.1
apache2-suexec-custom - 2.4.55-1ubuntu2.1
apache2-suexec-pristine - 2.4.55-1ubuntu2.1
apache2-utils - 2.4.55-1ubuntu2.1
libapache2-mod-md - 2.4.55-1ubuntu2.1
libapache2-mod-proxy-uwsgi - 2.4.55-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache2 package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.55-1ubuntu2.1').
